briefTitle: NEXUS Study for the Treatment of de Novo Native Coronary Artery Lesions
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Non-Randomized Study of the CYPHER NxT Sirolimus-Eluting Coronary Stent on BX SONIC OVER-THE-WIRE (OTW) Stent Delivery System(SDS)for the Treatment of de Novo Native Coronary Artery Lesions

interventions.name: CYPHER NxT SES ON BX SONIC OTW STENT DELIVERY SYSTEM (SDS)

summary: The objective of this study is to evaluate the effectiveness and safety of the CYPHER NxT Sirolimus-eluting Coronary Stent on the BX SONIC Over-the-Wire (OTW) Stent Delivery System (SDS) in patients with de novo native coronary artery lesions.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Achieved Procedure Success From Post-procedure to Hospital Discharge
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From post-procedure up to hospital discharge

effectByArm.arm: CYPHER NxT Stent on the BX SONIC OTW SDS

commonTop: Myocardial Infarction (Q wave or Non-Q wave)
